name: Christian Love in Action

address: Christian love in Action , Emmanuel Bungalow,
Plot No1, Opp Sadguru Nagar, Near Govind Nagar

briefDescription: Christian love in Action is an organisation working towards Eradication of Child Illiteracy. since the organisation has formed in year 1985 we have educated (3300) downtrodden, single parent,child - labor children in our boys and girls home and schools We have a Marathi medium school Alphas Marathi Medium School & Alphas English Medium School. We are situated in the kalwan taluk dist Nasik . We are working among the tribal (Aadiwasi) people for the upliftment of the Deprived. Our Objective is to eradicate illiteracy.
